about-me.question: Who am i ?
about-me.name: Hello! I'm Vlad.
about-me.intro: I am an experienced front-end developer based in Kyiv, Ukraine, with over three years of experience. My specialization is creating beautiful and modern websites. Over the years, I have mastered various technologies and development methods, and now I take pride in building responsive and appealing user interfaces from scratch.
about-me.experience: My experience working with different clients has helped me better understand their needs and create web solutions that truly work and deliver value.
about-me.skills: I'm always striving to improve my skills and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends in the front-end development industry. This helps me stay at the forefront and create modern and innovative web applications.
about-me.conclusion: If you have any interesting projects or ideas, let's discuss how I can help bring them to life!

contacts.question: Who am i
contacts.intro: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
